properties.name: uploadOptions
properties.description: Upload options including the url of post

subProperty.name: acceptedFiles
subProperty.description: Type of upload files, it can be separated by comman if it has multiple types

subProperty.name: addRemoveLinks
subProperty.description: Enable remove button on the thumbnail screen. Default value is true

properties.name: value
properties.description: If multiple property is true, it will bind Array of File, and if multiple property is false, it will bind File (2 way binding)

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Show Icon on the drop panel

properties.name: title
properties.description: Show title on the drop panel

properties.name: subTitle
properties.description: Show subTitle on the drop panel when preview turn off

properties.name: preview
properties.description: If this property is true, Show preview images, default value is true

properties.name: showErrors
properties.description: If this property is true, show errors under the image, else hide errors. Default is true

properties.name: preview
properties.description: Display the preview into the drop panel instead of the list below of drop panel

properties.name: uploadAreaStyles
properties.description: Mixed up passed styles for drop area

properties.name: remote
properties.description: When property true, component will emit 'remove' event for outside handling the removing of item and won't directly update the items that it's contained

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when input value changed with it's status
